page.title: 07GOLDTHORPE LIBRARY.
page.content: Goldthorpe Library is well situated, it is in the middle of Goldthorpe. The Library was built in 1968 and was opened in the same year. The Library is well used and they have about{26,000 books.} The service has been extended as they now lend cassettes and they have got about 20 records, which they also lend out. There are four staff in the Library and they collect about{Â£25.00 a week} in fines. There are three floors on the building, they are set out well but it does{not cater for the disabled. } The ventilation is bad in the manager's office as there is only one window and that only opens six inches before it hits the adjoining wall. In my opinion it provides an adequate service but the building could have been designed better.
